title: Motion of object from velocity time graph

content.prompt: An object’s velocity v as a function of time t is given in the graph above. Which of the following statements is true about the motion of the object?

choices.label: The object is not moving from t = 4 s to t = 10 s.
The object’s initial and final positions are the same.
The object is slowing down from t = 14 s to t = 16 s.
The average acceleration of the object from t = 0 s to t = 4 s is different from the acceleration from t = 34 s to t = 36 s.

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
